title: These amenity spaces shall be developed by the owner for the uses mentioned in the definition of amenity
clause_text: These amenity spaces shall be developed by the owner for the uses mentioned in the definition of amenity. However, the Authority may insist for handing over the amenity space to the Authority, if it is required for the following (2) six purposes only. If it is not required for the following (2) six purposes and required for other purposes, it may be taken over by the Authority with the consent of the owner.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
